context.rdfs:comment: The act of notifying an event organizer as to whether you expect to attend the event.
context.rdfs:label: RsvpAction

properties.rdfs:comment: If responding yes, the number of guests who will attend in addition to the invitee.
properties.rdfs:label: additionalNumberOfGuests

properties.rdfs:comment: The response (yes, no, maybe) to the RSVP.
properties.rdfs:label: rsvpResponse
